summary: Fallout Mod Manager's BSA Browser as a stand-alone application. (Skyrim compatible ofc)
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Updated BETA version with Fallout 4 support [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/17061?]HERE
[/url][/size]
I'm gonna continue updates over there now.


[size=5]Description[/size]

This is [url=http://sourceforge.net/projects/fomm/]Fallout Mod Manager[/url]'s BSA Browser as a stand-alone application that can be used without having to install Fallout 3 or New Vegas. It also offers some new features.

This application is open source and is available from GitHub: [url=https://github.com/AlexxEG/BSA_Browser]BSA_Browser
[/url]

[size=5]Features
[/size]
[list][*][size=2]Browse & extract file(s) from BSA[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Sort by folder, file name, file size, offset or extension[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Sort ascending or descending[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Filter files (optional Regex)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=3] - New

[/size][list][*][size=2]Browse multiple .BSA files simultaneously[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Recent files[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Quick export (See Tools -> Options menu)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Copy Path, Folder Path or File name[/size][/*]
[/list]

[size=5]Install & Uninstall
[/size]
Use the provided installer.


[size=5]Version History[/size]

[size=4] 1.4.2[/size]
[size=2]
[list]
[*]Fix "Header[size=2] checksum illegal" error[/size]
[*][size=2]Fix some ou[/size]t of range errors
[/list][/size]

[list]
[*][size=2]Fix missing DLL error[/size]

[list]
[*][size=2]Improved list performance, everything should be a bit faster now[/size]
[*][size=2]Allow wild card in normal search[/size]
[*][size=2]Add option for more columns (File size, offset, compressed)[/size]
[*][size=2]Add shortcuts to open quick extract paths[/size]
[*][size=2]Regex preference is now remembered[/size]
[*][size=2]Search term will now appear red if it's invalid[/size]
[*][size=2]Fix lag when searching, by adding a small delay[/size]
[/list]
[size=4] 1.3.1[/size]

[list][*][size=2]Fixed window appearing outside the screen's working area[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4] 1.3[/size]

[list][*][size=2]Add option to sort BSA directories[/size]
[*][size=2]Add option to toggle maintaining folder structure when using "Extract" button[/size]
[*][size=2]Ctrl + A to select all list items[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=4] 1.2[/size]

[list][*][size=2]Add currently shown files counter[/size]
[*][size=2]Add ability to create custom quick extract paths[/size]
[*][size=2]Show extracting progress in title[/size]
[*][size=2]Improve folder browser dialog[/size]
[*][size=2]Enable visual styles for Options list[/size]
[*][size=2]Extract files straight to selected folder when using "Extract" button[/size]
[*][size=2]Fix font rendering[/size]
[*][size=2]Fix Progress window "Cancel" button[/size]
[*][size=2]Fix file exists error when extracting more than one file from "Extract" button[/size]
[/list]
[size=4] 1.1[/size]

[list][*][size=2]Fix issue using latest opened archive properties (Compressed etc.) for every archive[/size]
[*][size=2]Improved "Options" UI[/size]
[*][size=2]Improved saving/restoring window state[/size]
[*][size=2]Removed 'Sort' button. Sort by default and save sorting preferences[/size]
[*][size=2]Add simple "About" box to new "Help" menu[/size]
[*][size=2]Show version in window title[/size]
[*][size=2]Don't format file offset, display full value[/size]
[*][size=2]Rename "Close Sel. Archive" to "Close Selected Archive"[/size]
[*][size=2]Installer: .bsa association is optional now[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4] 1.0[/size]

[list][*][size=2]Initial release[/size]
[/list]
author: AlexxEG

files.name: BSA Browser
files.changelogHtml:
Fix issue using latest opened archive properties (Compressed etc.) for every archive
Improved "Options" UI
Improved saving/restoring window state
Removed 'Sort' button. Sort by default and save sorting preferences
Add simple "About" box to new "Help" menu
Show version in window title
Don't format file offset, display full value
Rename "Close Sel. Archive" to "Close Selected Archive"
Installer: .bsa association is optional now

files.name: BSA Browser
files.changelogHtml:
Add currently shown files counter
Add ability to create custom quick extract paths
Show extracting progress in title
Improve folder browser dialog
Enable visual styles for Options list
Extract files straight to selected folder when using "Extract" button
Fix font rendering
Fix Progress window "Cancel" button
Fix file exists error when extracting more than one file from "Extract" button

files.name: BSA Browser
files.changelogHtml:
Add option to sort BSA directories
Add option to toggle maintaining folder structure when using "Extract" button
Ctrl + A to select all list items

files.name: BSA Browser Portable
files.changelogHtml:
Add option to sort BSA directories
Add option to toggle maintaining folder structure when using "Extract" button
Ctrl + A to select all list items

files.name: BSA Browser
files.changelogHtml: Fixed window appearing outside the screen's working area

files.name: BSA Browser Portable
files.changelogHtml: Fixed window appearing outside the screen's working area

files.name: BSA Browser
files.changelogHtml:
Improved list performance, everything should be a bit faster now
Allow wild card in normal search
Add option for more columns (File size, offset, compressed)
Add shortcuts to open quick extract paths
Regex preference is now remembered
Search term will now appear red if it's invalid
Fix lag when searching, by adding a small delay

files.name: BSA Browser Portable
files.changelogHtml:
Improved list performance, everything should be a bit faster now
Allow wild card in normal search
Add option for more columns (File size, offset, compressed)
Add shortcuts to open quick extract paths
Regex preference is now remembered
Search term will now appear red if it's invalid
Fix lag when searching, by adding a small delay

files.name: BSA Browser
files.changelogHtml: Fix missing DLL error. This new DLL is almost 3MB, which is why the download size is larger

files.changelogHtml: Fix missing DLL error. This new DLL is almost 3MB, which is why the download size is larger
